lead_paragraph: Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo presented a plan that would create a train hall in the James A. Farley Building on the west side of Eighth Avenue by 2020, while renovating the passageways at Penn Station.

headline.print_headline: New Home for Amtrak and L.I.R.R. in Cuomo’s Penn Station Plan
headline.main: Cuomo’s Vision for Revamped Penn Station: New Home for Amtrak and L.I.R.R.

snippet: Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo presented a plan that would create a train hall in the James A. Farley Building on the west side of Eighth Avenue by 2020, while renovating the passageways at Penn Station....
abstract: New York Gov Andrew Cuomo presents fast-track plan to covert Manhattan's James A Farley Post Office Building into train hall and retail space for Pennsylvania Station and to renovate station's cramped underground passageways and platforms; train hall is expected to open in December 2020.
